quote: Happiness will never come to those who fail to appreciate what they already have.
Happiness is a journey, not a destination.
Focusing on one thing that you are grateful for increases the energy of gratitude and rises the joy inside yourself.
Let gratitude be the pillow upon which you kneel to say your nightly prayer. And let faith be the bride you build to overcome evil and welcome good.
The greatest wealth is to live content with little.
If you can't fly, then run, if you can't run, then walk, if you can't walk, then crawl, but whatever you do, you have to keep moving forward.
How wonderful it is that nobody need wait a single moment before starting to improve the world.
The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
Creativity is contagious, pass it on.
